about_the_game:
🎮 Welcome to Gun Crate Raccoon: Infinite Run, the demo version of the ultimate arcade platformer shooter! 🚀 Dive into the heart-pounding action, collect crates to skyrocket your highscore, and conquer the leaderboard!

💥 Every crate presents a thrilling tactical dilemma: Do you risk it for a random new gun to boost your score, or do you strategically use your trusted weapon to clear the screen of relentless enemies?

🏆 Every run is unique: climb the procedurally generated Tower, choose perks that suit your playstyle and will aid you in your journey to the top.

What's in the demo?

The demo features two game modes:
  • Infinite mode — practice, try out different perks, and climb the leaderboards!
  • Daily run mode — each day every player gets the same Tower layout, weapons, and perks — and has only one chance to get the highest score for that day. The new Daily run is available at midnight UTC.

The demo includes:
  • 19 weapons — from Katana and Shotgun to Banana Grenades, Rocket Machinegun With Lightnings, and even Black Hole Generator.
  • 27 perks — every 10 crates you collect lets you select from a variety of perks that modify your weapons, increase your health, or create protective auras. Stack perks to make every run unique!
  • 6 enemy types
  • 1 boss

What to expect from the full game?

The full game will feature:
  • a Story mode where you will meet different characters, discover hidden secrets of the Tower, and receive permanent upgrades between runs
    Different biomes and bosses — do you like icy caves, moving platforms, and lava pits?
  • Much more weapons and perks
  • Customizable hats 🎩

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Any distribution
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Support for OpenGL 3.3
  • Storage: 100 MB available space

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: macOS 12
  • Processor: Apple M1 or Intel Core M
  • Graphics: Support for OpenGL 3.3
  • Storage: 300 MB available space

name: Gun Crate Raccoon: Infinite Run

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Support for OpenGL 3.3
  • Storage: 100 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

short_description: Gun Crate Raccoon is a fast-paced procedurally generated 2D arcade platformer shooter where you collect crates to get new guns and skyrocket your highscore. Choose random perks to make each run unique. The demo features the Intinite and Daily runs — join the fun and conquer the leaderboards!
